channel.title: Java parser?
channel.description:
How would I manage to change single fragments of a string when they have certain tags in it, such as minimal BBC code? I am using the Graphics.drawString method. I know I can use things such as Graphics.drawImage and Graphics.setFont, but
1) Is there a better way to setting bold, italics, printing pictures, without using those
and
2) How would I go about reading [img]http://url[/img] and just reading the url part?

item.title: Java parser?
item.dc:creator: @RLN RLN
item.description:
@RLN wrote:

  1. Why not use those?
  2. substring/regex/tokens

Read full topic
